name: Emtion
description:
Not like my first game, this is a work in progress. That mean its a pre-pre-pre-pre-pre-pre-pre-ALPHA, another word: prototype. Also there are two versions: with always flashlight on and one where you can turn it on and off. That's right, Folks, it ain't finished. Imma get back to work now. Cya.

Also, a deadmau5 helmet in one room. If you don't like him, deal with it.
